remarks: Value of a Dirichlet character at one.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2016.)
statement:
dchrmhm.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.b $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrelbas4.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
dchrzrh1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrzrh1 $p |- ( ph -> ( X ` ( L ` 1 ) ) = 1 ) $.
